botan.cert.x509.x509self

X.509 Self-Signed Certificate

License:
Botan is released under the Simplified BSD License (see LICENSE.md)

class X509CertOptionsImpl;
Options for X.509 certificates.

string common_name;
the subject common name

string country;
the subject counry

string organization;
the subject organization

string org_unit;
the subject organizational unit

string locality;
the subject locality

string state;
the subject state

string serial_number;
the subject serial number

string email;
the subject email adress

string uri;
the subject URI

string ip;
the subject IPv4 address

string dns;
the subject DNS

string xmpp;
the subject XMPP

string challenge;
the subject challenge password

X509Time start;
the subject notBefore

X509Time end;
the subject notAfter

bool is_CA;
Indicates whether the certificate request

size_t path_limit;
Indicates the BasicConstraints path limit

KeyConstraints constraints;
The key constraints for the subject public key

Vector!OID ex_constraints;
The key extended constraints for the subject public key

const void sanityCheck();
Check the options set in this object for validity.

void cAKey(size_t limit = 1);
Mark the certificate as a CA certificate and set the path limit.

Params:
size_t limit the path limit to be set in the BasicConstraints extension.

void notBefore(in string time_string);
Set when the certificate should become valid

Params:
string time_string the notBefore value of the certificate

void notAfter(in string time_string);
Set the notAfter of the certificate.

Params:
string time_string the notAfter value of the certificate

void addConstraints(KeyConstraints usage);
Add the key constraints of the KeyUsage extension.

Params:
KeyConstraints usage the constraints to set

void addExConstraint()(auto ref OID oid);
Add constraints to the ExtendedKeyUsage extension.

Params:
OID oid the oid to add

void addExConstraint(in string oid_str);
Add constraints to the ExtendedKeyUsage extension.

Params:
string oid_str the name to look up the oid to add

this(in string initial_opts = "", Duration expiration_time = 365.days);
Construct a new options object

Params:
string initial_opts define the common name of this object. An example for this parameter would be "common_name/country/organization/organizational_unit".
Duration expiration_time the expiration time (default 1 year)

X509Certificate createSelfSignedCert()(auto ref const X509CertOptions opts, in PrivateKey key, in string hash_fn, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a self-signed X.509 certificate.

Params:
X509CertOptions opts the options defining the certificate to create
PrivateKey key the private key used for signing, i.e. the key associated with this self-signed certificate
string hash_fn the hash function to use
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use

Returns:
newly created self-signed certificate

PKCS10Request createCertReq()(auto ref const X509CertOptions opts, in PrivateKey key, in string hash_fn, RandomNumberGenerator rng);
Create a PKCS#10 certificate request.

Params:
X509CertOptions opts the options defining the request to create
PrivateKey key the key used to sign this request
string hash_fn the hash function to use
RandomNumberGenerator rng the rng to use

Returns:
newly created PKCS#10 request
